full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DPAL RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I BKA' SDOD DANG BCAS PA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA 'DOD PA'I RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS BA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, ,RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARM'A BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS DBYEGS CES PA SHING MO SPRUL @012A *, ,GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SING DHI'I PHO BRANG DU YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG KUN DGES BGYIS SO, ,)
